alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 12:49PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bertie, southeastern Northampton and southern Hertford Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Williamston, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Windsor around 110 PM EDT. Ahoskie, Aulander and Powellsville around 130 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Goose Pond, Eagletown, Whites Crossroads, Kelford, Earleys, Newsome Store, Connaritsa, Republican, Trap and Quitsna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
